explain: int. - 哎呀；表示惊讶
adv. - 我的；表示吃惊等；表示亲切；对下级的称呼
abbr. - (=Malaysia)马来西亚
pron. - "I" 的所有格形式
网络 - 马来西亚(Malaysia)；关於我；买

example.en: Where's my passport?
example.cn: 我的护照在哪儿？

example.en: My feet are cold.
example.cn: 我的脚冷。

example.en: My goodness! Look at the time!
example.cn: 天哪！看看几点了！

example.en: my dear/darling/love
example.cn: 亲爱的；我的宝贝儿╱心肝儿

example.en: My dear girl, you're wrong.
example.cn: 我亲爱的姑娘，你错了。

explain: prep. - 用；和；有；具有
网络 - 和…一起；带有；以

example.en: She lives with her parents.
example.cn: 她同父母住在一起。

example.en: I have a client with me right now.
example.cn: 我现在有个客户。

example.en: a nice steak with a bottle of red wine
example.cn: 一份美味牛排再加上一瓶红葡萄酒

example.en: a girl with(= who has) red hair
example.cn: 一位红发女郎

example.en: a jacket with a hood
example.cn: 带风帽的短上衣

example.en: He looked at her with a hurt expression.
example.cn: 他带着受伤害的神情看着她。

example.en: They're both in bed with flu.
example.cn: 他们双双患流感卧病在床。

example.en: a man with a suitcase
example.cn: 提衣箱的男子

example.en: Cut it with a knife.
example.cn: 用刀把它切开。

example.en: It is treated with acid before being analysed.
example.cn: 对它先用酸处理再进行分析。

example.en: The bag was stuffed with dirty clothes.
example.cn: 袋子里塞满了脏衣服。

example.en: Sprinkle the dish with salt.
example.cn: 在这盘菜上撒上盐。

example.en: to fight with sb
example.cn: 与某人打架

example.en: to play tennis with sb
example.cn: 与某人打网球

example.en: at war with a neighbouring country
example.cn: 与邻国交战

example.en: I had an argument with my boss.
example.cn: 我跟老板吵了一架。

example.en: Be careful with the glasses.
example.cn: 小心这些玻璃杯。

example.en: Are you pleased with the result?
example.cn: 你对结果满意吗？

example.en: Don't be angry with her.
example.cn: 别生她的气。

example.en: With these students it's pronunciation that's the problem.
example.cn: 对这些学生来说，成问题的是发音。

example.en: She won't be able to help us with all the family commitments she has.
example.cn: 她有这么多家务事，帮不了我们。

example.en: It's much easier compared with last time.
example.cn: 这与上次相比容易得多。

example.en: The meal with wine came to $20 each.
example.cn: 包括酒这顿饭每人 20 块钱。

example.en: With all the lesson preparation I have to do I work 12 hours a day.
example.cn: 加上必须的备课在内，我每天工作 12 个小时。

example.en: He behaved with great dignity.
example.cn: 他举止庄重威严。

example.en: She sleeps with the window open.
example.cn: 她爱开着窗户睡觉。

example.en: Don't stand with your hands in your pockets.
example.cn: 站着的时候别把双手插在口袋里。

example.en: She blushed with embarrassment.
example.cn: 她难为情得脸红了。

example.en: His fingers were numb with cold.
example.cn: 他的手指冻麻了。

example.en: The shadows lengthened with the approach of sunset.
example.cn: 随着太阳西沉，影子越来越长。

example.en: Skill comes with practice.
example.cn: 熟能生巧。

example.en: Marine mammals generally swim with the current.
example.cn: 海洋哺乳动物一般顺水而游。

example.en: The keys are with reception.
example.cn: 钥匙在服务台。

example.en: Leave it with me.
example.cn: 把这交给我吧。

example.en: She acted with a touring company for three years.
example.cn: 她在一巡回剧团里演出了三年。

example.en: I bank with HSBC.
example.cn: 我的钱存在汇丰银行里。

example.en: I could never part with this ring.
example.cn: 我永远也不摘掉这枚戒指。

example.en: Can we dispense with the formalities?
example.cn: 我们可以免去这些客套吗？

example.en: With all her faults I still love her.
example.cn: 尽管她有种种缺点，我依然爱着她。

example.en: Off to bed with you!
example.cn: 你给我睡觉去！

example.en: Down with school!
example.cn: 取缔学校！

explain: n. - 名称；名字；名声；名誉
v. - 命名；任命；给…取名；说出…的名称
adj. - 〈美口〉著名的；(作品等)据以取名的
网络 - 姓名；品名；产品名称

example.en: What's your name?
example.cn: 你叫什么名字？

example.en: What is/was the name, please?(= a polite way of asking sb's name)
example.cn: 请问您叫什么名字？

example.en: Please write your full name and address below.
example.cn: 请将您的姓名和地址写在下面。

example.en: Do you know the name of this flower?
example.cn: 你知道这是什么花吗？

example.en: Rubella is just another name for German measles.
example.cn: 风疹只是德国麻疹的另一个名称。

example.en: Are you changing your name when you get married?
example.cn: 结婚时你要改姓氏吗？

example.en: She first made her name as a writer of children's books.
example.cn: 她最初是以儿童读物作家成名的。

example.en: He's made quite a name for himself(= become famous) .
example.cn: 他闯出了名气。

example.en: The college has a good name for languages.
example.cn: 这所大学的语言教学颇有名气。

example.en: This kind of behaviour gives students a bad name .
example.cn: 这种行为使学生们背上骂名。

example.en: a big-name company
example.cn: 著名公司

example.en: brand-name goods
example.cn: 名牌产品

example.en: Some of the biggest names in the art world were at the party.
example.cn: 一些艺术界的头面人物参加了聚会。

example.en: She asked for you by name.
example.cn: 她点名要找你。

example.en: The principal knows all the students by name.
example.cn: 校长能叫出所有学生的姓名。

example.en: I only know her by name(= I have heard about her but I have not met her).
example.cn: 我只是听说过她的名字。

example.en: She asked for you by name.
example.cn: 她点名要找你。

example.en: The principal knows all the students by name.
example.cn: 校长能叫出所有学生的姓名。

example.en: I only know her by name(= I have heard about her but I have not met her).
example.cn: 我只是听说过她的名字。

example.en: a young actor by the name of Tom Rees
example.cn: 名叫汤姆 ) 里斯的年轻演员

example.en: a young actor by the name of Tom Rees
example.cn: 名叫汤姆 ) 里斯的年轻演员

example.en: Have you entered your name for the quiz yet?
example.cn: 你申请参加这次问答比赛了吗？

example.en: Have you entered your name for the quiz yet?
example.cn: 你申请参加这次问答比赛了吗？

example.en: He took my place and got killed. It should have been me─that bullet had my name on it.
example.cn: 他坐了我的位子而送了命。死的应该是我，那颗子弹是冲着我来的。

example.en: Are you coming for dinner this evening? I've got a steak here with your name on it!
example.cn: 今晚你来吃饭吗？我为你准备了一块牛排呢！

example.en: He took my place and got killed. It should have been me─that bullet had my name on it.
example.cn: 他坐了我的位子而送了命。死的应该是我，那颗子弹是冲着我来的。

example.en: Are you coming for dinner this evening? I've got a steak here with your name on it!
example.cn: 今晚你来吃饭吗？我为你准备了一块牛排呢！

example.en: He runs the company in all but name.
example.cn: 他虽没有名分，却实际上在管理这家公司。

example.en: He runs the company in all but name.
example.cn: 他虽没有名分，却实际上在管理这家公司。

example.en: What in God's name was that noise?
example.cn: 那噪音究竟是怎么回事？

example.en: Where in the name of Heaven have you been?
example.cn: 你到底上哪儿去了？

example.en: What in God's name was that noise?
example.cn: 那噪音究竟是怎么回事？

example.en: Where in the name of Heaven have you been?
example.cn: 你到底上哪儿去了？

example.en: We reserved two tickets in the name of Brown.
example.cn: 我们用布朗的名字预订了两张票。

example.en: The car is registered in my name.
example.cn: 这辆车是用我的名字登记的。

example.en: I arrest you in the name of the law.
example.cn: 我依法逮捕你。

example.en: crimes committed in the name of religion
example.cn: 以宗教名义进行的犯罪活动

example.en: We reserved two tickets in the name of Brown.
example.cn: 我们用布朗的名字预订了两张票。

example.en: The car is registered in my name.
example.cn: 这辆车是用我的名字登记的。

example.en: I arrest you in the name of the law.
example.cn: 我依法逮捕你。

example.en: crimes committed in the name of religion
example.cn: 以宗教名义进行的犯罪活动

example.en: He's party leader in name only.
example.cn: 他只是名义上的政党领袖。

example.en: He's party leader in name only.
example.cn: 他只是名义上的政党领袖。

example.en: Hard work is the name of the game if you want to succeed in business.
example.cn: 要想生意兴旺，勤奋工作是关键。

example.en: Hard work is the name of the game if you want to succeed in business.
example.cn: 要想生意兴旺，勤奋工作是关键。

example.en: Miyazaki is still a name to conjure with among anime fans.
example.cn: 宫崎在日本动漫迷中仍是一个大名鼎鼎的名字。

example.en: He comes from Tighnabruaich─now there's a name to conjure with!
example.cn: 他来自 Tighnabruaich，这个名字真够拗口的！

example.en: Miyazaki is still a name to conjure with among anime fans.
example.cn: 宫崎在日本动漫迷中仍是一个大名鼎鼎的名字。

example.en: He comes from Tighnabruaich─now there's a name to conjure with!
example.cn: 他来自 Tighnabruaich，这个名字真够拗口的！

example.en: I recognize the tune but I can't put a name to it.
example.cn: 这曲子我听过，但想不起叫什么了。

example.en: I recognize the tune but I can't put a name to it.
example.cn: 这曲子我听过，但想不起叫什么了。

example.en: Have you been taking my name in vain again?
example.cn: 你又在滥用我的名义吧？

example.en: Have you been taking my name in vain again?
example.cn: 你又在滥用我的名义吧？

example.en: an Olympic athlete with five gold medals to his name
example.cn: 夺得五枚金牌的一名奥林匹克运动员

example.en: She doesn't have a penny/cent to her name(= she is very poor) .
example.cn: 她身无分文。

example.en: an Olympic athlete with five gold medals to his name
example.cn: 夺得五枚金牌的一名奥林匹克运动员

example.en: She doesn't have a penny/cent to her name(= she is very poor) .
example.cn: 她身无分文。

example.en: He was named after his father(= given his father's first name) .
example.cn: 他的名字跟他父亲一样。

example.en: They named their son John.
example.cn: 他们给儿子起了个名字叫约翰。

example.en: The victim has not yet been named.
example.cn: 受害人的姓名仍未得知。

example.en: Can you name all the American states?
example.cn: 你能说出美国所有的州名吗？

example.en: The missing man has been named as James Kelly.
example.cn: 失踪者已被确认为詹姆斯 ) 凯利。

example.en: Name your price .
example.cn: 给个价吧。

example.en: They're engaged, but they haven't yet named the day(= chosen the date for their wedding) .
example.cn: 他们订婚了，但还未确定结婚日期。

example.en: Activities available include squash, archery and swimming, to name but a few .
example.cn: 所设活动项目包括壁球、射箭、游泳等等，不一而足。

example.en: Chairs, tables, cabinets─ you name it , she makes it(= she makes anything you can imagine) .
example.cn: 椅子、桌子、橱柜，凡是你说得出的她都能做。

example.en: I had no hesitation in naming him (as) captain.
example.cn: 我毫不犹豫地任命他为队长。

example.en: When she resigned, he was named to the committee in her place.
example.cn: 她辞职后，他被指定取代她进入委员会。

explain: v. - 是
abbr. - (=island；isle)岛；群岛
网络 - 冰岛；在；印度标准(Indian Standard)
adv. - 你的；您的；你们的；（泛指）大家的
pron. - 你(们)的；大家都很知道的
网络 - 称别人的事物；物主代词

example.en: I like your dress.
example.cn: 我喜欢你的连衣裙。

example.en: Excuse me, is this your seat?
example.cn: 对不起，这是您的座位吗？

example.en: The bank is on your right.
example.cn: 银行在你的右边。

example.en: Dentists advise you to have your teeth checked every six months.
example.cn: 牙医建议大家每六个月检查一次牙齿。

example.en: In Japan you are taught great respect for your elders.
example.cn: 在日本，人们要学会非常尊敬长辈。

example.en: This is your typical English pub.
example.cn: 这就是典型的英格兰酒吧。

example.en: You and your bright ideas!
example.cn: 你的主意可真高明！

example.en: Your Majesty
example.cn: 陛下

example.en: Your Excellency
example.cn: 阁下

explain: v. - 认为；以为；想；思考
n. - 想法；念头；〈方,口〉思考
adj. - 思想(方面)的；供思考的
网络 - 考虑；思索；想起

example.en: Do you think (that) they'll come?
example.cn: 你认为他们会来吗？

example.en: I thought I heard a scream.
example.cn: 我好像听到了一声尖叫。

example.en: I didn't think you liked sports.
example.cn: 我原以为你不喜好运动。

example.en: Am I right in thinking that you used to live here?
example.cn: 我想你过去在这里住过，对吗？

example.en: I think this is their house, but I'm not sure.
example.cn: 我想这是他们的家，但不敢肯定。

example.en: He ought to resign, I think.
example.cn: 我看他应该辞职。

example.en: We'll need about 20 chairs, I should think .
example.cn: 我看我们需要大约 20 把椅子。

example.en: It was once thought that the sun travelled around the earth.
example.cn: 人们曾经认为太阳绕着地球转。

example.en: What did you think about the idea?
example.cn: 你原先认为这个想法怎么样？

example.en: Well, I like it. What do you think ?
example.cn: 嗯，我喜欢这个想法。你认为怎么样？

example.en: ‘Will we make it in time?’ ‘I think so .’
example.cn: “我们会及时完成吗？”“我想会的。”

example.en: ‘Is he any good?’ ‘I don't think so .’
example.cn: “他怎么样？”“我认为一般。”

example.en: I think it highly unlikely that I'll get the job.
example.cn: 我认为我得到这份工作的可能性极小。

example.en: She thought him kind and generous.
example.cn: 她认为他宽厚仁慈。

example.en: He's thought to be one of the richest men in Europe.
example.cn: 他被认为是欧洲最富有的人之一。

example.en: Are animals able to think?
example.cn: 动物会思考吗？

example.en: Let me think(= give me time before I answer) .
example.cn: 让我想一想。

example.en: I can't tell you now─I'll have to think about it .
example.cn: 我现在无法告诉你，我得考虑一下。

example.en: She had thought very deeply about this problem.
example.cn: 她曾经对这个问题深深思考过。

example.en: All he ever thinks about is money.
example.cn: 他满脑子想的只是钱。

example.en: I'm sorry, I wasn't thinking(= said when you have upset or offended sb accidentally) .
example.cn: 对不起，我太冒昧了。

example.en: He was trying to think what to do.
example.cn: 他在努力想办法。

example.en: You're very quiet. What are you thinking?
example.cn: 你一声不吭，在想什么？

example.en: I was just thinking what a long way it is.
example.cn: 我刚才在琢磨路途太远了。

example.en: ‘I must be crazy,’ she thought.
example.cn: “我准是疯了。”她想。

example.en: We couldn't think where you'd gone.
example.cn: 我们猜想不出来你到哪里去了。

example.en: Just think how nice it would be to see them again.
example.cn: 试想一下要是能再见到他们该有多好。

example.en: I can't think (that) he would be so stupid.
example.cn: 我不能想象他会这么蠢。

example.en: Just think ─we'll be lying on the beach this time tomorrow.
example.cn: 想想看，明天这个时候我们就躺在海滩上了。

example.en: If I'm late home, my mother always thinks the worst .
example.cn: 如果我回家晚了，我母亲总是往最坏处想。

example.en: Try to think yourself into the role.
example.cn: 尽量发挥想象力，使自己进入角色。

example.en: I never thought (that) I'd see her again.
example.cn: 我从未料想到还会见到她。

example.en: The job took longer than we thought.
example.cn: 这项工作用的时间比我们预想的多。

example.en: You'd think she'd have been grateful for my help(= but she wasn't) .
example.cn: 你还期望她会对我的帮助感恩戴德呢。

example.en: Who would have thought to find you here?
example.cn: 谁会料到你在这儿呢？

example.en: Let's think positive.
example.cn: 咱们往好的方面想吧。

example.en: You need to think big(= aim to achieve a lot) .
example.cn: 你要敢想。

example.en: If you want to make money, you've got to think money.
example.cn: 你要想赚钱，就得一门心思琢磨钱。

example.en: What do you think you're doing?
example.cn: 你以为你在干什么？

example.en: I thought we could go out tonight.
example.cn: 我本想我们今晚可以出去。

example.en: Twenty guests are enough, I would have thought.
example.cn: 我觉得二十位客人就够了。

example.en: Do you think you could open the window?
example.cn: 请打开窗子好吗？

example.en: ‘You've made a mistake.’ ‘I don't think so.’
example.cn: “你出错了。”“我想不会吧。”

example.en: I think I'll go for a swim.
example.cn: 我想去游泳。

example.en: I'm thinking in terms of about 70 guests at the wedding.
example.cn: 我打算邀请 70 位嘉宾参加婚礼。

example.en: I didn't think(= it did not occur to me) to tell her.
example.cn: 我没有想到要告诉她。

example.en: I can't think where I put the keys.
example.cn: 我想不起把钥匙放在哪儿了。

example.en: Come to think of it, he did mention seeing you.
example.cn: 想起来了，他确实提到看见过你。

example.en: Come to think of it, he did mention seeing you.
example.cn: 想起来了，他确实提到看见过你。

example.en: Me? Fail? I don't think so.
example.cn: 我？失败？我可不这样认为。

example.en: Me? Fail? I don't think so.
example.cn: 我？失败？我可不这样认为。

example.en: It was a difficult situation, when you think about it.
example.cn: 仔细想来，当时处境是很困难的。

example.en: It was a difficult situation, when you think about it.
example.cn: 仔细想来，当时处境是很困难的。

example.en: ‘He said he'd forgotten.’ ‘I thought as much.’
example.cn: “他说忘了。”“果然不出我所料。”

example.en: ‘He said he'd forgotten.’ ‘I thought as much.’
example.cn: “他说忘了。”“果然不出我所料。”

example.en: Rosie was about to protest but thought better of it.
example.cn: 罗西刚要抗议，但又一想决定作罢。

example.en: Rosie was about to protest but thought better of it.
example.cn: 罗西刚要抗议，但又一想决定作罢。

example.en: She has behaved appallingly─I must say I thought better of her.
example.cn: 她的行为太恶劣了，看来我过去是高看了她。

example.en: She has behaved appallingly─I must say I thought better of her.
example.cn: 她的行为太恶劣了，看来我过去是高看了她。

example.en: She thinks nothing of walking thirty miles a day.
example.cn: 她认为一天步行三十英里不足为奇。

example.en: She thinks nothing of walking thirty miles a day.
example.cn: 她认为一天步行三十英里不足为奇。

example.en: You should think twice about employing someone you've never met.
example.cn: 雇用素不相识的人应三思而行。

example.en: You should think twice about employing someone you've never met.
example.cn: 雇用素不相识的人应三思而行。

example.en: He thinks the world of his daughter.
example.cn: 他非常器重女儿。

example.en: I don't think much of her idea.
example.cn: 我认为她的主意不怎么样。

example.en: He thinks the world of his daughter.
example.cn: 他非常器重女儿。

example.en: I don't think much of her idea.
example.cn: 我认为她的主意不怎么样。

example.en: To think that my mother wrote all those books and I never knew!
example.cn: 想想看，我母亲写了那么多部书，我竟然一无所知！

example.en: To think that my mother wrote all those books and I never knew!
example.cn: 想想看，我母亲写了那么多部书，我竟然一无所知！

example.en: I'll have a think and let you know tomorrow.
example.cn: 我要好好想一想，明天告诉你。

example.en: I'll have a think and let you know tomorrow.
example.cn: 我要好好想一想，明天告诉你。

explain: int. - 谢谢；（接受好意）好的；（婉言谢绝）不用了
n. - 感谢；谢意；感激
v. - “thank”的第三人称单数
网络 - 多谢；致谢；谢谢你

example.en: Thanks for lending me the money.
example.cn: 多谢您借钱给我。

example.en: Many thanks for your support.
example.cn: 多谢您的支持。

example.en: ‘How are you?’ ‘Fine, thanks(= thanks for asking) .’
example.cn: “你好吗？”“好，谢谢。”

example.en: ‘Would you like a coffee?’ ‘Oh, thanks.’
example.cn: “来杯咖啡好吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

example.en: ‘Here's the change.’ ‘ Thanks very much .’
example.cn: “这是找你的零钱。”“非常感谢。”

example.en: ‘Would you like some more?’ ‘No thanks.’
example.cn: “再要一点儿吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

example.en: How can I ever express my thanks to you for all you've done?
example.cn: 对你所做的一切，我怎么才能表达谢意？

example.en: Thanks are due to all those who worked so hard for so many months.
example.cn: 感谢这么多月来辛勤工作的每一个人。

example.en: She murmured her thanks.
example.cn: 她低声道谢。

example.en: We managed to get it finished in the end─no thanks to him(= he didn't help) .
example.cn: 我们终于把这件事完成了，但这没有他的什么功劳。

example.en: We managed to get it finished in the end─no thanks to him(= he didn't help) .
example.cn: 我们终于把这件事完成了，但这没有他的什么功劳。

example.en: Thanks a lot for all you've done.
example.cn: 多谢你所做的一切。

example.en: ‘I'm afraid I've finished all the milk.’ ‘Well, thanks a lot!’
example.cn: “对不起，我把牛奶都喝了。”“哦，多谢了！”

example.en: Thanks a lot for all you've done.
example.cn: 多谢你所做的一切。

example.en: ‘I'm afraid I've finished all the milk.’ ‘Well, thanks a lot!’
example.cn: “对不起，我把牛奶都喝了。”“哦，多谢了！”

example.en: It was all a great success─thanks to a lot of hard work.
example.cn: 由于尽心竭力，这才大获成功。

example.en: Everyone knows about it now, thanks to you!
example.cn: 多亏了你，现在大家都知道了！

example.en: It was all a great success─thanks to a lot of hard work.
example.cn: 由于尽心竭力，这才大获成功。

example.en: Everyone knows about it now, thanks to you!
example.cn: 多亏了你，现在大家都知道了！

explain: na. - 站起来；持久；露头角；〔美俚〕背约
网络 - 起立；我挺你；站得住脚
na. - 坐下；住定；占有；(坐下来)开始工作(谈判等)
网络 - 扎营；雪堂请侬坐；坐吧
